entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
